description: A Java mathematics library that extends the core Hipparchus mathematics library (hipparchus-core).  Functionality includes linear algebra over R^n and C^n (e.g. Matrix, ComplexMatrix, Eigen, LinearSolver, complex Schur using the M-shifted large-bulge QR alg., and real and Complex QR and Hessenberg decompositions using Householder transformations), frameworks for and implementations of hyper-dimensional (N-dimensional) geometry (e.g., NOrthotope, NBall, RealNDomain, AbstractNDomain), weighted non-linear least-squares optimization (Levenmerg-Marquardt with geodesic acceleration), non-linear dynamics (e.g., DynamicalSystem, StateTransitionMatrix),and a rich framework of multi-variate, vector- and matrix-valued function definitions (e.g., MultivariateVectorValuedFunction, VectorField, MultivariateMatrixValuedFunction).
